QuestData.Title: The Eye of the Storm
QuestData.Description: Greetings, $n.$b$bYes, you are known to the Earthen Ring by name.$b$bYour exploits and accomplishments are many. Azeroth already stands in your debt, and yet again she is in need of her heroes.$b$bI am but a messenger. A familiar presence seeks audience with you.$b$bPeer into the Waters of Farseeing and behold the fate of our world.
QuestData.LogDescription: Farseer Krogar wants you to look into the Waters of Farseeing.
QuestData.RewardText: Now that your eyes have seen the truth, where will you choose to serve?
